source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: The Art & Science of Drawing / BASIC SKILLS
items.headline: Drawing is not a talent. It's a skill anyone can learn.
objectives_summary: How to draw any shape.
How to observe and analyze any subject.
How to draw any form by breaking it down into basic shapes before adding dark lines.

items.title: How to Draw From Beginner to Master
items.headline: Drawing and Shading From Fundamentals to Photorealism
objectives_summary: You’ll learn the fundamentals of drawing
You’ll learn about materials Like the different pencil lead weights and what each one is best used for
Shading techniques

items.title: The Secrets to Drawing
items.headline: A comprehensive video and ebook course designed for people wanting to learn the core concepts of drawing.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, the student will have a strong understanding of the core concepts of drawing including materials, processes, and devices.

items.title: How To Make Soap - Homemade Soap Making for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Shona
visible_instructors.title: Shona O'Connor
visible_instructors.job_title: Crafter, Maker of Soap, Hair, Bath and Body, Trainer

items.headline: How to make your own soap at home using the cold process soapmaking method. A step by step guide for beginners
objectives_summary: Create home made natural soap from scratch, using natural ingredients, which you probably have in your pantry
Make pure and natural soap, free from harmful ingredients, avoiding known irritants
Easily calculate how much soap you need to make to fill your mold, and create your own recipes

items.title: The Colored Pencil Drawing Course
items.headline: Draw Like a Pro With Colored Pencils
objectives_summary: Learn how to become a pro with colored pencils
Mix colors and understand color theory
Be familiar with common colored pencil surfaces and colored pencil types

items.title: BEST SELLER Beginners Watercolor. Get clear on the BASICS.

visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur

items.headline: Painting in watercolor? Start with the real BASICS. Play, learn, gain understanding & confidence as you play & paint.
objectives_summary: Students will learn how watercolor paints work with the water and so how to use them effectively.
Students will learn and understand the principle of a color wash.
Students will learn how layers of washes of the same color can create shape and shading.

items.title: The Art & Science of Figure Drawing: GESTURE
items.headline: Learn everything you need to know about drawing dynamic, expressive figures.
objectives_summary: How to draw dynamic figures that come to life on the page.
How to capture the action of any pose.
How to assemble the parts of the figure into a dynamic whole.

items.title: Procreate: Draw, Sketch, Paint, and Design on Your iPad
items.headline: Learn how to draw on your iPad with this complete Procreate course! Bring your imaginations to life with digital art!
objectives_summary: You will be confident using Procreate
Learn all of the tools and brushes available
Save and export your Procreate drawings

items.title: The Ultimate Drawing Masterclass: Start Drawing Better Today
items.headline: Learn how to draw with this complete beginner to advanced drawing course!
objectives_summary: Draw any kind of art from your imagination
Understand drawing fundamentals and concepts like a pro
Draw shapes and add perspective to your artwork

items.title: HOW TO PAINT FROM BEGINNER TO MASTER
items.headline: Oil Painting For All Skill Levels
objectives_summary: A process and structure to creating a painting from start to finish, that’s easy for anyone to manage!
You’ll know the best supplies mediums and cleaners to buy and how to use them.
How to mix a 10 value greyscale, shading and how to make a gradient in every value with paint.

items.title: Anime Drawing for Beginners
items.headline: Learn how to draw characters in Anime Style!
objectives_summary: Draw full body anime characters with basic poses
Use DesignDoll software for creating models with any pose
Draw chibis (miniature characters)

items.title: Paint Realistic Watercolor and Botanicals - STUDIO BASICS

visible_instructors.name: Heidi
visible_instructors.title: Heidi Willis
visible_instructors.job_title: Renowned Watercolor Artist and Art Tutor

items.headline: This foundation tutorial will help you understand essential work+studio basics for realistic watercolour and botanicals
objectives_summary: Know how to GET STARTED ON THE RIGHT FOOT!
Understand sound studio, materials and technique basics needed to create realistic watercolour and botanical paintings
Learn about materials so you understand what to purchase... don't waste money on the wrong things!

items.title: Watercolor Painting For Beginners | By Award Winning Artist
items.headline: Learn the Essentials | Master the Basics | Two full workshops packed in 1 great course | All the FUN without the FLUFF!
objectives_summary: Learn the essentials first before the basics
Understand how watercolor behaves
How much water to use

items.title: The Art & Science of Drawing / DYNAMIC MARK MAKING
items.headline: Create compelling drawings using expressive mark making.
objectives_summary: How to use the pencil to create a wide range of expressive and engaging lines marks.
How to infuse your line work with emotion that truly connect with a viewer.
How to draw objects in a way that give the viewer a sense of what it feels like to the touch.

items.title: The Art & Science of Drawing / FORM & SPACE
items.headline: Learn to draw in 3-Dimensions
objectives_summary: How draw the foundational volumes, spheres, cylinders and cubes, in any orientation in space.
How to break any form down into basic volumes and in doing so, understand how to draw them 3-Dimensionally.
How to draw objects properly in perspective.

items.title: The Beginner's Guide to Digital Art with Procreate on iPad!
items.headline: Learn the basics of digital art on your iPad with these step-by-step lessons for Procreate, a powerful digital art app!
objectives_summary: Students will understand how to use Procreate's powerful art tools.
Students will learn a workflow, step-by-step, that works for many types of art - comics, manga, cartoons, & more!
Students will be able to use Procreate's built in recording features to create fun time-lapse drawings and paintings - great for sharing on social media!
